name: Frontier Guard
description:
Frontier Guard is a single player sci-fi shmup. Battle enemy star fighters and take on unique boss enemies. Collect power ups for more powerful weapons, shields, torpedoes, and more.

This an early access Alpha 1 version. Development will continue through additional alphas, a beta, and final release. The price will increase as we proceed through future phases. Get the game at the lowest price now and help us to improve it.
